*****does not show any graphics, mockupPreview with rtemplateMockUpPreview template does that ***** *****not used except for large sise site customization along with rtemplateMockup.xhtml********* HomeMockUp page parameters passed: none popupPanelh: 4 todo: TopLeft and left top Graphics and menuMockUp (comes from rtemplateMockUp) mid graphics is part of home.xhtml and wont be shown if clob/blobdata is missing then some of the menue wont be rendered toolbar collapsible panels to show topleft mid lefttop products news etc select skin .rf-tb { background-color:#{richSkin.tableSubHeaderBackgroundColor} !important; background-image: none; !important; color:#{richSkin.tableHeaderTextColor} !important; } .rf-cp-hdr { background-color:#{richSkin.additionalBackgroundColor} !important; background-image: none; !important; color:#{richSkin.tableHeaderTextColor} !important; border-color:none; } .rf-p-hdr { background-color:white !important; background-image: none; !important; color:#{richSkin.tableHeaderTextColor} !important; border-color:none; } ul { padding-left: 10px; } Above area uses menueMockUp via rtemplateMockUp and msgKey is used for menue Labels like messages[identity.msgKey] and set by commandlink popup menueMockUp has leftmost menue to show different labels. The labels have p:commandLink to change values to preview or actual use. Below area is used to show the Hdr/graphics/HdrLink/text for the current selection and msgTempKey is used show non menue page decorations ie graphics and html text. For HdrLink show content otherwise fires up link with values like B3R-TOP-LEFT-C or B3R-TOP-LEFT-M and set by preview or Use button action collapsible panels show all data for system and owner2 ie tenant escape as false is used because ckedit already filters and put escapes on the entered text. Edit Home page

Manage #{customIdentity.owner2} #{messages['page']} #{messages['pictures']} and #{messages['captions']}

  • Click on #{messages['Site']} #{messages['look']} to show predefined page layout sections like Top Backgroud,Middle Footer
  • Each section has 3 sub sections ie top Header Text, Graphics for Images and Body text
  • Each subsection can have up to 5 detail sections using sequnce # as 0 to 4
  • Button New to create a mockup or preview ,Edit to update existing and Remove to delete, Publish to copy preview to actual and show to public.
  • Note! Welcome page ie (TopBackGr) has only Graphics. You can do special effect ie fade out by adding "asis" as image type prefix. This works for seq 1 and 2 only.
  • use the #{messages['preview']} #{messages['window']} to open a separate window to see your changes

    Manage #{customIdentity.owner2} #{messages['content']} #{messages['under']} #{messages['visitor']} #{messages['menue']}

  • Visitors like a good looking site, but they won't re-visit unless they see relevant and useful information
  • here also, each section has 3 sub sections ie top Header Text, Graphics for Images and Body text
  • Button New to create a mockup or preview ,Edit to update existing and Remove to delete, Publish to copy preview to actual and show to public
  • use the #{messages['preview']} #{messages['window']} to open a separate window to see your changes

    Manage #{customIdentity.owner2} #{messages['web']} #{messages['theme']} #{messages['and']} #{messages['menue']} #{messages['font']}

  • Visitors can also change theme, but here you can change the default theme.
  • Theme will basically change the color and in some cases the shape of the panels like rounded instead of rectangular.
  • Font can be entered as 40px Tangerine, Georgia, Serif; or as 20px Georgia depending on how many menu items are shown
  • The menue bar height can be changed by entering say 16px or 100px , browser may adjust font size to fit the height

    •      Edit site theme and menu font do not show size to avoid confusion as it needs !important . size can be ist part of font>
